about.bio: A dedicated Front-end Developer Based in Yogyakarta, Indonesia
about.desc: I am a self-taught web developer proficient in creating responsive websites. My creativity is reflected in aesthetically pleasing designs, while my passion for learning and quick adaptability allows me to stay abreast of technological developments. I have expertise in Html, Css, JavaScript, Vue, React, Next, Bootstrap, Tailwind, Figma, Git, enhancing my ability to deliver comprehensive and visually appealing web solutions.

project.name: Cozy Havens
project.desc: The Cozy Havens website is an online platform that allows users to rent accommodations, offering a user-friendly interface to discover, compare, and reserve accomodations in Yogyakarta. This website mirrors a project from an online course with slightly different design and content.

project.name: My Portfolio
project.desc: My Portfolio is an online website that display collection of my projects, ranging from personal to business project.

project.name: Lumat
project.desc: Lumat is an online platform that represents the brand "LUMAT". It provides comprehensive information about the profile, products, portfolio, and contact details for ordering or other business purposes. This was my first professional project, commissioned and compensated for my development services.

project.name: Digitronix
project.desc: Digitronix is an e-commerce site for electronic products. With a user-friendly interface, customers can easily browse, compare, and purchase electronics. Digitronix offers detailed product descriptions and secure payment options, making it one-stop destination for electronics.

project.name: Lumat 2.0
project.desc: This website was migrated from Lumat 1.0. It is built with Next.js and utilizes cloud data storage to enhance website performance and SEO optimization. Additionally, the code features an improved file structure and cleaner code.
